com.gwidgets.api.leaflet

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwidgets.api.leaflet.TileLayer
      • com.gwidgets.api.leaflet.Canvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILayer

    @JsType(isNative=true)
public class Canvas
extends TileLayer
    Used to create Canvas-based tile layers where tiles get drawn on the browser side.
    Author:
    Zakaria Amine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      L drawTile(HTMLCanvasElement canvas, Point tilePoint, java.lang.Number zoom)
      You need to define this method after creating the instance to draw tiles; canvas is the actual canvas tile on which you can draw, tilePoint represents the tile numbers, and zoom is the current zoom.
      void tileDrawn(HTMLCanvasElement canvas)
      If async option is defined, this function should be called for each tile after drawing completion.

      • Methods inherited from class com.gwidgets.api.leaflet.TileLayer

        addTo, bringToBack, bringToFront, clearAllEventListeners, fire, getContainer, off, on, onAdd, once, onRemove, redraw, setOpacity, setUrl, setZIndex

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • drawTile

        @JsMethod
public L drawTile(HTMLCanvasElement canvas,
                             Point tilePoint,
                             java.lang.Number zoom)
        You need to define this method after creating the instance to draw tiles; canvas is the actual canvas tile on which you can draw, tilePoint represents the tile numbers, and zoom is the current zoom.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas element
        tilePoint - the tile point
        zoom - the zoom
        Returns:
        the L class

      • tileDrawn

        @JsMethod
public void tileDrawn(HTMLCanvasElement canvas)
        If async option is defined, this function should be called for each tile after drawing completion. canvas is the same canvas element, that was passed to drawTile.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas element
